description: This file defines a service module for user administration in a frontend application, providing functions to check API configuration, fetch user data, and update user roles via backend API endpoints.

methods.name: getAdminApiStatus
methods.description: Checks if the admin API is configured and returns its availability and base URL.

methods.name: fetchUsers
methods.description: Fetches the list of users from the backend admin endpoint if available.

methods.name: updateUserRole
methods.description: Updates a user's role via the backend admin endpoint if available.
